title: Valkyrie
author: Craig Alanson
targetAudience: Readers who enjoy science fiction and fantasy adventures, particularly fans of space operas
relatedBooks: The Expanse series by James S.A. Corey
Old Man's War by John Scalzi
The Forever War by Joe Haldeman
keyInsights: Exploration of moral dilemmas in warfare
The importance of camaraderie in challenging situations
The balance between duty and personal desires
